objects.specification: A subtle patterned floor surface resembling outdoor terrain with muted earth tone hues, composed of durable material with a slight textured finish that evokes natural ground patterns. Designed to provide a stable, non-reflective surface suitable for a classroom environment.

Smooth indoor walls painted in a neutral off-white color, with a matte finish to reduce glare and provide a calming backdrop suitable for mounting educational materials. The walls are flat and unadorned except for mounted objects.

A rectangular student desk featuring a warm oak wood veneer tabletop supported by slender matte black metal legs. The edges are gently rounded for safety, and the surface has a subtle wood grain texture in an earth tone finish. The desk is sized to comfortably seat one student with space for books and writing materials.

A standard student chair with a contoured oak wood seat and backrest supported by a sturdy matte black metal frame. The chair features smooth rounded edges, a moderate back height for ergonomic posture support, and an earth tone finish that complements the desk surfaces.

A larger rectangular teacher's desk crafted from solid oak wood veneer with a built-in modesty panel and sturdy matte black metal supports. The tabletop has a smooth finish with visible wood grain, offering ample workspace for lesson materials. The desk exhibits an earth tone aesthetic consistent with the student furniture.

An ergonomic teacher chair featuring a cushioned seat and backrest upholstered in neutral woven fabric, atop a swivel metal base with matte black finish. The chair includes lumbar support and adjustable seat height, blending professional functionality with a cohesive classroom style.

A large rectangular dark green chalkboard surface with a matte finish, framed by slim polished wooden edging. The board provides a smooth writing area with high contrast visibility, suitable for chalk-based lessons.

A laminated educational poster depicting vibrant dinosaur illustrations and informative text. The poster has a glossy finish, bright colors, and reinforced edges for durability, ideal for classroom display.

A simple wall-mounted wooden shelf with a light oak veneer surface and matte black metal brackets. The shelf has a slim profile and sturdy construction, designed to hold lightweight decorative items.

A small detailed dinosaur figurine model with realistic textured surface and painted finish. The model captures anatomical features and is scaled appropriately as a decorative educational piece.

A large stylized dinosaur skeleton replica composed of interconnected cylindrical bone elements and cubic joint connectors. The white skeletal structure has a matte finish, showcasing simplified anatomical forms in a visually engaging exhibit.

A tall freestanding wooden bookshelf with multiple evenly spaced shelves, crafted from oak veneer with visible wood grain. The shelves are stocked with various dinosaur-related books displaying colorful spines.
A low-profile rectangular LED ceiling light fixture with a diffused frosted cover. The housing has a matte white finish, providing soft, even illumination across the classroom.

A round analog wall clock with a white face, minimalist black hour markers and hands, and a slim polished metal frame. The clock features a silent sweep movement and clear readability.
A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage in a terracotta-style planter. The leaves have a natural varying green hue, adding organic warmth to the interior space.
A small cylindrical plastic waste bin with a matte finish. The bin has an open top design and a neutral gray color, suitable for classroom use.
